pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Friday, August 19, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Les Îles-de-la-Madeleine, Quebec

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will make a local infrastructure announcement and hold a media availability. Minister of National Revenue Diane Lebouthillier will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local microbrewery. Minister of National Revenue Diane Lebouthillier will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local bakery. Minister of National Revenue Diane Lebouthillier will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
